item.description: Hello Ladies and Gentleman! We will be meeting at Harbour Park in Middletown on this night for a great social outing. Look for me at 07:15p.m. in the parking lot. I'll be in the black nissan altima with tinted windows. If you have trouble or any questions call me or email me my number is 860-919-9782. Harbour Park is an awesome place in the summertime. Please try and RSVP so I can get a head count. If you don't RSVP I'll assume your not coming so if you could try and do that please. Looking forward to this night and seeing all of you!
item.how_to_find_us: Black Nissan Altima with tinted windows in the parking lot or call me 860-919-9782
item.name: Thursday Night Social
